According to the original game forums, you need to download the newest PhysX drivers. PhysX_9.09.0814_SystemSoftware.exe is for Nvidia cards, which can be acquired from nvidia site. However there are reports that the Steam and directtodrive versions of the game is corrupted, and game cannot be completed.

Hi, I had the New-game error too, like the game crashes and says the program needs to...blah blah blah...but thats often because you have your adaptive anti alaising enabled, go to your catalysc controlcenter and disable it (or was it the catalysc AI? dun remember) and now you can play:D
worked for me, didn't even have to change any settings, may tweak later, updated my direct X, not that it should have needed to, and installed Phys X itself. very cool game
2.4ghz P4, 1.5 ram ddr1, 750mhz 512mb GPU ATI HD 3650, plays acceptably, on default\detected settings.

hey, lolwut11234

how did u fix this problem? it happens to me too. what do I do??

I dled this, put in the crack and i crashed so i dled this

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5084081/Darkest.of.Days.Crash-FIX

and i never crashed since.

This game is good, i reccomend it

If you're experiencing the OpenAL32.dll error, go to the setup folder in your install directory, which is most likely C:\Program Files\8monkey Labs\Darkest of Days\setup and run the OpenAL installer (oalinst).

This will allow you to run the game, but you will most likely be presented with the crashing issue. Download the latest PhysX software and this should fix the issue.

Hope that I was of some assistance.

Ok When I started this I got
"Steam Error" Application load error 5:00000(yada yada) " I forgot, sue me. 
Anyways 
HOW I FIXED THIS. go into the Drive, that you mounted it to, and go to the "Contents" folder. Inside you'll find the .exe.

Simply copy the .exe from the disc to the actual folder with your game in it.

Enjoy

hey blueeyes,
i found out what to do.
1. open the TORRENT FILE.(the one with all the winrar crap in it. i opened it with winrar)
2. look for the exe file that says darkestofdays.exe
3. extract that file to the your darkest of days folder (program files>8monkeylabs>darkestofdays.

Hope this helps... Good Luck!

Hi, i'm having trouble with the new game issue.  When i hit the button the game loads for lik 2 seconds and then crashes.  I'm wondering what my problem is.  I don't think its my rig, because it can run anything specs wise. I also tried downloading three different torrents of this game, so this one isn't the problem.  I get the microsoft general error, and when i click on more information i get this 
AppName: darkestofdays.exe	 AppVer: 0.0.0.0	 ModName: unknown
ModVer: 0.0.0.0	 Offset: 00000000

I really don't know what that means, but i have a quad core processor, 3 gigs of ram on a xp, and have an nvidia (something, but its newer) and a x-fi sound blaster.  

If anyone knows a solution i'd be glad to hear it. Also, sorry for the long post lol, but i have needs of an answer.
Thanks!

know how to solve the crash-while-new-game problem. Go here and dl / install this.

http://www.nvidia.com/content/DriverDownload-March2009/confirmation.php?url=/Windows/8.09.04/PhysX_8.09.04_SystemSoftware.exe‚å©=us&type=Other

Then go here:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5084081/Darkest.of.Days.Crash-FIX

And dl / install that. This should work, as it did for me. Good Luck!
F..k ! This game cannot be finished due to repeating crash, and cannot be patched due to checksum error when you try to install a patch! F.....g frustrating!

iBleedFuchsia is right :
i had the same crash issue,i coudnt even get to finish installing the game,but i finally got it to work =) 

1 - first issue,while installin : it said somthing like "an error ocurred while trying to install some crap.." any1 having the same error,just select "ignore" then copy "darkestofdays.exe" inside "skidrow" folder that comes with game to your main instalation directory  by default "C:\Program Files\8monkey Labs\Darkest of Days"

2 - as for the crash issue,here is what i did: 
go to instalation directory again "C:\Program Files\8monkey Labs\Darkest of Days" there should be a folder (physx) open it,and instal the PhysX_9.09.0814_SystemSoftware(latest version),then go back and open another folder (setup),install oalinst.exe , and vcredist_x86.exe.. et voila!!! the game working like a charm! 

im on windows 7 btw.
Thanks very fast download !! I am installing it now and I hope it will work
Ok i figured out the steam error crap. All you have to do is open up the iso file and double click on the "skidrow" file and copy the exe into the game folder and replace it and then run the game
